maml:description.maml:para: Converts a Decimal IP address into a binary format.
ConvertTo-BinaryIP uses System.Convert to switch between decimal and binary format. The output from this function is dotted binary string.

maml:Description.maml:para: An IP Address to convert.
An IP Address to convert.

dev:remarks.maml:para: Converts 192.168.0.1 to a dotted binary format.

maml:description.maml:para: Converts a Decimal IP address into a 32-bit unsigned integer.
ConvertTo-DecimalIP takes a decimal IP, uses a shift-like operation on each octet and returns a single UInt32 value.

maml:Description.maml:para: An IP Address to convert.
An IP Address to convert.

maml:description.maml:para: Returns a dotted decimal IP address from either an unsigned 32-bit integer or a dotted binary string.
ConvertTo-DottedDecimalIP uses a regular expression match on the input string to convert to an IP address.

maml:Description.maml:para: A string representation of an IP address from either UInt32 or dotted binary.
A string representation of an IP address from either UInt32 or dotted binary.

dev:remarks.maml:para: Converts a decimal IP to Dotted Decimal IP.
Converts a Binary IP to Dotted Decimal IP.

maml:description.maml:para: Returns a dotted decimal subnet mask from a mask length.

ConvertTo-Mask returns a subnet mask in dotted decimal format from an integer value ranging between 0 and 32. ConvertTo-Mask first creates a binary string from the length, converts that to an unsigned 32-bit integer then calls ConvertTo-DottedDecimalIP to complete the operation.

maml:Description.maml:para: The number of bits which must be masked.
The number of bits which must be masked.

dev:remarks.maml:para: Converts valid Subnet Mask 255.128.0.0 to mask length 9.

maml:description.maml:para: Returns the length of a subnet mask.
ConvertTo-MaskLength accepts any IPv4 address as input, however the output value only makes sense when using a subnet mask.

maml:Description.maml:para: A subnet mask to convert into length
A subnet mask to convert into length

dev:remarks.maml:para: Converts valid subnet mask 255.128.0.0 to mask length 9.

maml:description.maml:para: Takes an IP address and subnet mask then calculates the broadcast address for the range.

Get-BroadcastAddress returns the broadcast address for a subnet by performing a bitwise AND operation against the decimal forms of the IP address and inverted subnet mask. Get-BroadcastAddress expects both the IP address and subnet mask in dotted decimal format.

maml:Description.maml:para: Any IP address within the network range.
The subnet mask for the network.
CIDR formatted IP Address and Mask Length
Any IP address within the network range.
The subnet mask for the network.
CIDR formatted IP Address and Mask Length

dev:remarks.maml:para: Returns the Broadcast Address for a given IP Address and Subnet Mask.
Returns the Broadcast Address for a given IP Address and Subnet Mask.

maml:description.maml:para: Takes an IP address and subnet mask then calculates the network address for the range.

Get-NetworkAddress returns the network address for a subnet by performing a bitwise AND operation against the decimal forms of the IP address and subnet mask. Get-NetworkAddress expects both the IP address and subnet mask in dotted decimal format.

maml:Description.maml:para: IP Address in Dotted Decimal format
The subnet mask for the network.
CIDR formatted IP Address and Mask Length
IP Address in Dotted Decimal format
CIDR formatted IP Address and Mask Length
The subnet mask for the network.

dev:remarks.maml:para: Returns the Network Address for a given IP Address and Subnet Mask.
Returns the Network Address for a given IP Address and Subnet Mask.

maml:description.maml:para: Returns an array of IPs in a given network range.
Returns an array of IPs in a given network range.

maml:Description.maml:para: IP Address in Dotted Decimal Format
The subnet mask for the network
CIDR formatted IP Address and Mask Length
Range of IPs separated by a hyphen (192.168.0.1-192.168.0.50)
IP Address in Dotted Decimal Format
CIDR formatted IP Address and Mask Length
Range of IPs separated by a hyphen (192.168.0.1-192.168.0.50)
The subnet mask for the network

dev:remarks.maml:para: Returns IPAddresses in provided CIDR network.
Returns IPAddresses in provided network range.
Returns IPAddresses in provided IpAddress and SubnetMask.

maml:description.maml:para: Returns a network summary of the provided IPAddress and Subnet Mask.
Provides details for the provided network, including: Network Broadcast Range RangeStart RangeEnd Mask MaskLength Hosts Class IsPrivate

maml:Description.maml:para: IP Address in Dotted Decimal Format
The subnet mask for the network
CIDR formatted IP Address and Mask Length
IP Address in Dotted Decimal Format
CIDR formatted IP Address and Mask Length
The subnet mask for the network

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- Example 1 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code: PS C:\> Get-NetworkSummary -IPAddress 192.168.0.1 -SubnetMask 255.255.255.0 Network : 192.168.0.0 Broadcast : 192.168.0.255 Range : 192.168.0.1 - 192.168.0.254 RangeStart : 192.168.0.1 RangeEnd : 192.168.0.254 Mask : 255.255.255.0 MaskLength : 24 Hosts : 254 Class : C IsPrivate : True

dev:remarks.maml:para: Returns the Network Summary for a given IP Address and Subnet Mask.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- Example 2 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code: PS C:\> Get-NetworkSummary -IpAndMaskLength 192.168.0.1/24 Network : 192.168.0.0 Broadcast : 192.168.0.255 Range : 192.168.0.1 - 192.168.0.254 RangeStart : 192.168.0.1 RangeEnd : 192.168.0.254 Mask : 255.255.255.0 MaskLength : 24 Hosts : 254 Class : C IsPrivate : True

dev:remarks.maml:para: Returns the Network Summary for a given IP Address and Subnet Mask.

maml:description.maml:para: Tests to determine if a given IPAddress or Network is contained by another Network or Ip Range.
Tests to determine if a given IPAddress or Network is contained by another Network or Ip Range. Returns $true or $false

maml:Description.maml:para: Range of IPs separated by a hyphen (192.168.0.1-192.168.0.50)
CIDR network and mask length
CIDR network and mask length
CIDR network and mask length
CIDR network and mask length
IPAddress in Dotted Decimal format
Range of IPs separated by a hyphen (192.168.0.1-192.168.0.50)
IPAddress in Dotted Decimal format
CIDR network and mask length
CIDR network and mask length
IPAddress in Dotted Decimal format
Range of IPs separated by a hyphen (192.168.0.1-192.168.0.50)

dev:remarks.maml:para: Tests to see if 192.168.0.2 is contained by 192.168.0.0-192.168.0.50
Tests to see if 192.168.0.4/30 is contained by 192.168.0.0/24
